location: Songjiang Road 108 Alley, near Songjiang Nanjing MRT Station
notes: High-end modern studio with smart home features (motorized curtains, dimmable lighting), Samsung 65" TV, and TOTO smart toilet. Building has elevator, rooftop garden, and B1 fitness center with hotel-style management. At 13.5 ping this is a compact space for a growing family; no layout details about separate bedroom but balcony is mentioned - verify railing safety for child. Very convenient MRT location (136m to station).
